Uses of Interface
net.truelicense.api.AuthenticationInjection

  • Packages that use AuthenticationInjection 
    Package Description
    net.truelicense.api
    Provides life cycle management for license keys.

    • Uses of AuthenticationInjection in net.truelicense.api

      Methods in net.truelicense.api that return AuthenticationInjection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.algorithm(String algorithm)
      Sets the name of the signature algorithm (optional).
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.alias(String alias)
      Sets the alias name of the key entry.
      AuthenticationInjection<? extends This> LicenseManagerBuilder.authentication()
      Returns an injection for a key store based authentication.
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.keyProtection(PasswordProtection keyProtection)
      Sets the password protection which is used for accessing the private key in the key entry (optional).
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.loadFrom(Source source)
      Sets the source for the key store (optional).
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.loadFromResource(String name)
      Sets the resource name of the key store (optional).
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.storeProtection(PasswordProtection storeProtection)
      Sets the password protection which is used for verifying the integrity of the key store.
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.storeType(String storeType)
      Sets the type of the key store, for example "JCEKS" or "JKS" (optional).
